  • Uses of Action in game.dinosaur.behaviours

    Methods in game.dinosaur.behaviours that return Action
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    abstract Action Behaviour.getAction​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
    A factory for creating actions.
    Action BreedingBehaviour.getAction​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
    The breeding action method that directs dino to layeggaction or moves dinosaur closer to the mate and finally makes them breed
    Action FlyBehaviour.getAction​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
    The fly action method that check whether a dino is able to fly and adds or removes the FLYING capability based on preset conditions
    Action FollowBehaviour.getAction​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
    The normal follow behavior action for when target is an actor
    private Action FollowBehaviour.getAction​(Actor actor, Location here, Location there)
    Continuation of the getAction for the previous two methods
    Action HungerBehaviour.getAction​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
    Locate food action to follow the food and perform the eatActions
    Action ThirstBehaviour.getAction​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
    Locate water source action to follow the water source and perform the drinkActions
    Action UnconsciousBehaviour.getAction​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
    Unconscious behavior action to return the action performed by actor if unconscious also creates the corpse if actor hungry or dehydrated for too long
    Action WanderBehaviour.getAction​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
    Returns a MoveAction to wander to a random location, if possible.
    Action FollowBehaviour.getFollowLocationAction​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
    The follow behavior action for when target is a Location
    Action BreedingBehaviour.layEggAction​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
    the layeggaction that lays and egg based on the breeding counter and type of dinosaur

    This method is called when a carnivore eats the corpse of a dinosaur
    Action Carnivore.eatMeat()
    This method is called whenever a carnivore locates its food source and continues to carry out tbe action specific to the carnivore type to increase its food level

    This method is used to move the dinosaur near food location when its hungry
